mapper.select: SELECT music_user_id AS userId, music_user_name AS userName, music_user_phone AS userPhone, music_user_email AS userEmail, music_user_avatar AS userAvatar, music_user_attnum AS userAttentionNum, music_user_fannum AS userFanNum, music_user_sex AS userSex, music_user_brief AS userBrief, music_user_regisdate AS userRegisterDate FROM music_user_info WHERE music_user_id = #{userId}
